metadata.title: Thursday, 19th October, 2023
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a)   whether the Government has any plans to tar the Mbesuma-Kafwimbi road in Chinsali District; and
(b)   if so, when the plans will be implemented. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER (STANDING ORDER 75) W2. Mr Hamwaata (Pemba) - to ask the Minister of Education:
(a)  what the deficit for teachers’ houses was, as of June, 2023, countrywide, district by district;
(b)  what the estimated cost of constructing the houses at (a) is;
(c)   whether the Government is considering using a Public Private Partnership (PPP) model of development to address the deficit;
(d)     if so, when the project is expected to commence; and
(e)     if the PPP model is not desirable, why. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Supply - Motion (29 th September) - Resumption of Debate. ___________________________
